mapper.sql: id, eid, did, jid, content, date, splace, eplace, kmcount, gasolineunit, gasoline, status,tiid
mapper.select: select t.*, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname, de.id as deid,de.name as dename, jt.id as jtid,jt.name as jtname from used_cars t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id left outer join jobtype_dic jt on t.jid = jt.id where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select t.*, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname, de.id as deid,de.name as dename, jt.id as jtid,jt.name as jtname from used_cars t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id left outer join jobtype_dic jt on t.jid = jt.id where t.status=0 and t.checked=1 and em.fullname like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" order by t.date desc
limit ${pageable.offset}, ${pageable.pageSize}

select t.*, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname, de.id as deid,de.name as dename, jt.id as jtid,jt.name as jtname from used_cars t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id left outer join jobtype_dic jt on t.jid = jt.id where t.status=0 and t.checked=1 order by t.date desc
limit ${offset}, ${pageSize}

select t.*, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname, de.id as deid,de.name as dename, jt.id as jtid,jt.name as jtname from used_cars t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id left outer join jobtype_dic jt on t.jid = jt.id where t.tiid = #{tiid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and t.status=0 order by t.date desc

select count(*) from used_cars t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id where em.fullname like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" and t.status=0 and t.checked=1
select count(*) from used_cars where status=0 and checked=1
mapper.insert: insert into used_cars (id, eid, did, jid, content, date, splace, eplace, kmcount, gasolineunit, gasoline, status,tiid,checked ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{employee.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dealer.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{splace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eplace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kmcount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{gasolineunit,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{gasoline,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tiid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{checked,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

insert into used_cars
id,
eid,
did,
jid,
content,
date,
splace,
eplace,
kmcount,
gasolineunit,
gasoline,
status,
tiid,
checked,

mapper.update:
update used_cars
eid = #{employee.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
did = #{dealer.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
jid = #{type.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
date = #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
splace = #{splace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
eplace = #{eplace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
kmcount = #{kmcount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
gasolineunit = #{gasolineunit,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
gasoline = #{gasoline,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
tiid = #{tiid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
checked = #{checked,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update used_cars set eid = #{employee.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, did = #{dealer.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, jid = #{type.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, date = #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, splace = #{splace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, eplace = #{eplace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, kmcount = #{kmcount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, gasolineunit = #{gasolineunit,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, gasoline = #{gasoline,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tiid = #{tiid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, checked = #{checked,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
